pullrequest.title: Improve atlas uleg simple shape collisions

content.raw:
Looks good. Can you do the same for the lower legs? Especially the large occupied region in the hollow of the knee might cause problems with the vehicle.
There's also an offset issue for the lower arms: http://i.imgur.com/lT1lPiq.png
content.html: Looks good. Can you do the same for the lower legs? Especially the large occupied region in the hollow of the knee might cause problems with the vehicle. There's also an offset issue for the lower arms: http://i.imgur.com/lT1lPiq.png
